Watchdog Parameters. More...

#include <drivers/watchdog/Watchdog.h>

ESM_Handle esmHandle
 

Detailed Description

Watchdog Parameters.

Watchdog parameters are used to with the Watchdog_open() call. Default values for these parameters are set using Watchdog_Params_init().

See also
Watchdog_Params_init()

Field Documentation

Watchdog_Callback Watchdog_Params_t::callbackFxn

Pointer to callback. Valid when resetMode = Watchdog_RESET_OFF.

Watchdog_DebugMode Watchdog_Params_t::debugStallMode

Mode to stall watchdog at breakpoints.

ESM_Handle Watchdog_Params_t::esmHandle

ESM Handle.

uint32_t Watchdog_Params_t::preloadValue

Preload value.

Watchdog_ResetMode Watchdog_Params_t::resetMode

Mode to enable resets.

SOC_Handle Watchdog_Params_t::socHandle

SOC Handle.

Watchdog_WindowSize Watchdog_Params_t::windowSize

Windowed watchdog window size.
